name: Carrot Dig
description:
Welcome to Carrot Dig!

Carrot Dig is a little game I made for fun and to get experience. It features around a dozen small levels where you bounce around, break the environment, and try to get to the goal.

NOTES: resizing window will probably distort the pixel art a little. I don't recommend it if you want the game to look as nice as possible. For the web version, the sound effects are delayed. This is a problem with Godot's web exports. Download the game for not-delayed sfx.
